name: Bouncing Ball Journey
description:
A blue ball’s thrilling journey in an unpredictable world. The path what you see will change in any time, so you may fall down or crash on the cubes easily. To reach the destination, you must keep the law of survival in mind: tap the screen timely to jump forward!

- Timing is everything
- Tap the screen to bounce
- Don’t fall off the cubes or crash on them

Give it a whirl and see how far you can you go!
